title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 says that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting
OB: The behavior described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting is not true for the current trunk. Instead, the default 'jsessionid' is used.
EB: The documentation needs to be updated to reflect the actual behavior. The custom cookie name should have an impact on URL rewriting as described in ch.7.1.1.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached war file named 'cookiename.war' 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/3/
